com.cm.contentmanager.android.api

Interface ContentManagerJsi

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface ContentManagerJsi
    Android 4.4 (KitKat) includes a new WebView component based on the Chromium open source project. Owing to this change, using content:// URLs to load files from a content provider is not allowed. That is, web content hosted outside your application is not allowed to access files built into your application. Hence, this component has been deprecated.
